title: Discount Christmas Store.
body: I was just wondering if we are going to get the discount shop thing again for Christmas. I didn't know where to ask, sorry if this isn't where i ask.

replies.body:
I don't have any specific news regarding a personalized shop this year, though what *Lew* mentioned may be along the right track, since the Beta Client is a fairly big part of the League experience right now. Regardless, there's still a lot going on for this year's Snowdown event, so I recommend checking out the [**event page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016) for more details if you haven't already done so.

Let me know if you have any questions.
There won't be a personal sales shop because they didn't get that feature into to the new client yet.
